response.overview: Get an up-close look at some spectacular MTH layouts with this documentary that train collectors will love. Highlights include an interview with MTH's president, Mike Wolf; the MTH showroom's two-level layout created by internationally renowned designer Richard Johnson; collector Tony Lash's stunning layout featuring a wonderful collection of trains, amazing scenery and $60,000 worth of trees; and a fantasy layout including a circus.
response.title: Great MTH Layouts: Parts 1 & 2
